messages.title: A chance to make a difference… to lend a hand.
messages.content: Katy Gordon has helped young people get jobs for the first time, and is prepared to stand up and fight for a fair deal for Glasgow North.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Katy Gordon has been involved in stopping the closure of local post offices and joining with parents to protest about primary school closures by the Labour Council.
Katy Gordon is against the Labour government closing out our primary schools and is engaging in actions to ensure they are not taken for granted and that locals are represented.
Katy Gordon has completed a 10k for a local women's health centre, presumably showing support for local health services.
Katy Gordon recommends keeping up the fight to tackle climate change.

issues.education: Katy Gordon is fighting against Labour government school closures and wants to ensure primary schools are adequately supported.
issues.environment: Katy stresses the importance of continuing the fight against climate change.
issues.health: Involvement with local women's health centre suggests a focus on supporting health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: 'Gutsy down to earth fighter who won’t take no for an answer.'

quotes.text: 'Gutsy down to earth fighter who won’t take no for an answer.'

images.caption: Images showcasing Katy Gordon's participation in various events and activities, such as graduating from Aberdeen Uni, engaging in local protests, being interviewed about the Lloyds TSB takeover, involvement in outdoor activities, participating in a Wave march in Glasgow, and with Lib Dem volunteers.
